杀机和朋友一起是真的挺好玩，但是前期没有技能的时候就很难受，我建议萌新玩家先去把德怀特的携手合作点出来，再去玩黑妹把自摸点出来，就可以去快乐送快递了。

Fun game but needs rebalancing and voice chat adding. Many killers complain about 4 survivors being on Discord, TeamSpeak etc. and thus effectively getting most aura  perks for free (IE Empathy, Bond, Alert if you have a mate pallet looping) since you can tell each other where you and your team mates are, and the killer has been sighted. Thus you are good to spend perk slots on more valuable perks as survivor. There is no way to stop this from happening aside from removing survive with friends (SWF), which would probably kill the game.. So should just bite the bullet, embrace it, and add voice chat and pinging so you can balance for more coordinated survivors and everyone wins.

Getting facecamped is nice. 10/10

For real though, this is a great game, and with friends even better.
sometimes awesome, sometimes annoying in so many ways, but i just can't stop playing it. Love it or leave it, stop whining!

This game, for me is quite enjoyable! sure there may be a toxic person here and there, but past that you have a mostly friendly community, able to have quite a fun game experience overall! and dont worry, if you start out and just keep dying, its part of the process, you just gotta learn and adapt! I once just quit the game for a while because i kept getting tunneled or not playing well!

It takes time, or get lucky, overall you gotta get used to it and then it becomes a good game!
This game is Nice a few bugs but still awesome
Fun game If you can deal with the community.

Dead by Daylight ist ein asymmetrisches Survival Game bei dem 4 Survivor versuchen müssen, einem Killer zu entgehen, indem sie Generatoren in der Trial reparieren um die Ausgänge zu aktivieren. Der Killer andererseits will diese der Entität opfern.

Das Spiel macht eine Menge Spaß, unter Anderem auch wegen der großen Zahl an verschiedenen Killern, die größtenteils jedoch entweder langwierig mit einer In-Game Währung erspielt werden müssen (gilt nicht für lizenzierte Killer) oder als DLC erworben werden müssen, mit unterschiedlichen Fähigkeiten zum Nutzen oder Countern.

Durch regelmäßige Content-Updates bleibt das Spiel auch recht erfrischend -- alle 3 Monate ein neues DLC, außerdem regelmäßige Archiv Updates, in dem man durch das Absolvieren von verschiedenen Herausforderungen Geschichten über gewisse Charaktere freispielen kann.
Naprawde spoko gra w zajebistym klimacie polecam Iwona Pawlowicz
very good game. Im glad to see the server working
This game is addictive and can have really scary moments if you don't pay attention to your surroundings. :3
